definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]

sentences.english: The drain should be soft and pliable .
sentences.chinese: 引流物應是軟而易彎的。

sentences.english: This is a bow that bends easily.
